instructions: Download the iCloud for Windows app. If you have Microsoft Windows 10 May 2019 Update (or later), use the Microsoft Store . Otherwise, see the Apple Support article Download iCloud for Windows . Enter the Apple ID and password you used to set up iCloud on your iOS device, iPadOS device, or Mac. Turn on the features you want to use, then click Apply. For more information about setting up iCloud features on Windows, see the following: Photos: Set up your devices to use iCloud with the Photos app . iCloud Drive: Set up iCloud Drive on an iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, or computer .
